mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESERVATION (RESERVATION_NO, USERS_ID, RESERVATION_DATE, RESERVATION_STATUS) VALUES( RESERVATION_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{usersId}, TO_DATE(#{reservationDate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:MI'), #{reservationStatus} )
mapper.select: SELECT TR.TABLE_NO FROM RESERVATION R JOIN TABLE_RESERVATION TR ON R.RESERVATION_NO = TR.RESERVATION_NO WHERE TO_CHAR(R.RESERVATION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') = #{reservationSearch}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT R.RESERVATION_NO, R.RESERVATION_DATE, R.USERS_ID, TR.TABLE_NO, TO_CHAR(R.RESERVATION_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS FORMATTED_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY R.RESERVATION_DATE DESC) AS RN FROM RESERVATION R JOIN TABLE_RESERVATION TR ON R.RESERVATION_NO = TR.RESERVATION_NO WHERE R.USERS_ID = #{userId} AND R.RESERVATION_DATE < SYSDATE AND R.RESERVATION_STATUS = 'y' ) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{offset} + 1 AND #{offset} + #{limit}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TABLE_RESERVATION TR JOIN RESERVATION R ON TR.RESERVATION_NO = R.RESERVATION_NO WHERE R.USERS_ID = #{usersId} AND R.RESERVATION_STATUS = 'y' AND R.RESERVATION_DATE < SYSDATE
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RESERVATION WHERE RESERVATION_STATUS = 'y' AND RESERVATION_NO = #{reservationNo}
